heading: ***WINTER STORM WARNINGS AND ADVISORIES THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR THE GREEN MOUNTAINS AND ADIRONDACKS***Today
text: Snow showers in the north and mountains, from a dusting in the valleys to 3 inches in the mountains. Clouds, breaks of sun, and a few flurries in southern valleys. Blustery and cold. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s north, in the 30s south. Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting 30 to 40 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers becoming scattered in the north and mountains, a dusting to an inch. Partial clearing in the Champlain and southern valleys. Lows ranging through the 20s. Winds northwest 10 to 20 mph, gusting 30 to 40 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Mostly cloudy from the Adirondacks and Rt. 2 north, with a few passing snow showers. Becoming partly sunny in the Champlain Valley, and mostly sunny south. Highs 30 to 40 north to south. West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph.
